title: MFST 397
intro: Second of a three part "plan-do-review" series with the goal of immersing students in a professional metropolitan food and environmental systems-related experience. In this course, students will complete the learning experience developed in MFST 301, including the previously defined learning objectives, work product, and grading rubric. At least two weeks of full-time (40 hrs of work) or its equivalent is required for each term hour of credit.
